entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
